content: crochet coastal wave baby blanket - the stitch pattern of this delightful blanket gives it a look of the sea waves gently rolling in the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 32 5 x 30 5 inches level intermediate copyright ©2025 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/coastal-wave-baby-afghan/
